headline: Piper Sandler Remains Positive on Adobe Inc. (ADBE) Despite Concerns
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the 12 Cheap Technology Stocks to Invest In According to Hedge Funds. On February 3, Piper Sandler downgraded Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) from Overweight to Neutral, lowering the price target from $470 to $330. Piper Sandler’s Billy Fitzsimmons remains concerned about Adobe’s seat-compression and vibe-coding narratives and believes that could […]

headline: Is Adobe (ADBE) Now Offering Value After A 42% One Year Share Price Decline
summary: If you are wondering whether Adobe's share price now reflects a fair deal or a potential opportunity, this article aims to help you make sense of where the stock stands from a valuation perspective. Adobe closed at US$255.17, with returns of a 2.0% decline over 7 days, a 15.2% decline over 30 days, a 23.4% decline year to date, a 42.5% decline over 1 year, a 21.2% decline over 3 years, and a 45.3% decline over 5 years. These moves may have caught the attention of investors watching for...
